text:
CHINA TOLD THE WORLD HEALTH ORGANIZATION ABOUT CORONAVIRUS IN DECEMBER 2019

I've no idea why Trump keeps saying China didn't tell anyone about coronavirus—though my guess is that he's trying to keep anyone from noticing it took him OVER A MONTH to do anything with China's notice
